Key Match Events: Cole Anthony unintentionally injured Jaden Ivey, causing him to exit the game on a stretcher.
Post-Match Reflections: Detroit Pistons head coach J.B. Bickerstaff expressed his emotions and highlighted the team's bond and care for Jaden Ivey.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ivey scored 22 points in 27 minutes, shooting 8 of 11 from the field and 5 of 6 from 3-point range.
